mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS aId, a.title, a.click_nums, a.category_id, a.collection, a.content, a.list_pic, a.gmt_modified, a.user_id, u.id, u.user_img, u.username FROM article AS a INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.is_show = 1 and a.is_delete=0

SELECT a.id AS aId, a.title, a.click_nums, a.category_id, a.content, a.list_pic, a.gmt_modified, a.user_id, u.id, u.user_img, u.username, u.info, c.id as cId, c.name, (select count(id) from article_comment where article_comment.article_id=a.id) as comment FROM article AS a INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON a.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN `article_category` AS c ON a.category_id = c.id WHERE a.category_id=#{id} and a.is_show = 1 and a.is_delete=0

SELECT a.id AS aId, a.title, a.click_nums, a.category_id, a.content, a.list_pic, a.gmt_modified, a.user_id, u.id, u.user_img, u.username, u.info, c.id as cId, c.name, (select count(id) from user_follows where user_follows.user_id=u.id) as follow, (select count(id) from user_follows where user_follows.followed_user=u.id) as fan FROM article AS a INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON a.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN `article_category` AS c ON a.category_id = c.id WHERE a.id=#{id} and a.is_show = 1 and a.is_delete=0
